title: Episode 120: How to Support Your Grieving Friends and Loved Ones (with Dr. Illene Cupit)
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In our final episode of the season, Ryan and Georjeanna talk with thanatologist and fellow UWGB professor, Dr. Illene Cupit, about ways we can better support people who are grieving. We learn some valuable tips on how to talk with and support people through the bereavement journey.
itunes:subtitle: In our final episode of the season, Ryan and Georâ€¦
description: In our final episode of the season, Ryan and Georjeanna talk with thanatologist and fellow UWGB professor, Dr. Illene Cupit, about ways we can better support people who are grieving. We learn some valuable tips on how to talk with and support people through the bereavement journey.
